normalised: I remember feeling so lost after my M B B S exams at A I I M S. Like a scene from "Dear Zindagi," I needed guidance. A friend suggested a mental health app. It helped me track my mood swings and even offered some simple breathing exercises. Now, even my Dadi uses it sometimes! It's a start, right?
